t: 1:3–4*r Other punctuation is possible:...  not one thing was created. What was created in him was life
1:5*r Or grasp, or comprehend, or overtake; Jn 12:35
1:9*r Or The true light who comes into the world gives light to everyone, or The true light enlightens everyone coming into the world.
1:13*r Or not of human lineage, or of human capacity, or of human volition
1:14*r Or and dwelt in a tent; lit and tabernacled
1:14*r Son is implied from the reference to the Father and from Gk usage.
1:18*r Other mss read The one and only Son, who is at the Father’s side
1:27*r Other mss add who came before me
1:34*r Other mss read is the Chosen One of God
1:41*r Both Hb Messiah and Gk Christos mean “anointed one”
1:42*r Other mss read “Simon, son of Jonah
1:42*r Both Aramaic Cephas and Gk Petros mean “rock”
2:4*r Or “What does that have to do with you and me; lit “What to me and to you; Mt 8:29; Mk 1:24; 5:7; Lk 8:28
2:20*r Or was built forty-six years ago
3:3*r Or from above, also in v. 7
3:13*r Other mss add who is in heaven
3:15*r Other mss add not perish, but
3:16*r Or For in this way God loved the world, and so he gave, or For God so loved the world that he gave
3:20*r Lit and does not come to the light
3:25*r Other mss read and the Jews
3:36*r Or refuses to believe in the Son, or disobeys the Son
4:9*r Or do not share vessels with
4:9*r Other mss omit For Jews do not associate with Samaritans.
4:23*r Or in spirit and truth, also in v. 24
4:39*r Lit because of the woman’s word
5:2*r Some mss read Bethzatha; other mss read Bethsaida

5:3*r Some mss include vv. 3b-4:— waiting for the moving of the water, 4 because an angel would go down into the pool from time to time and stir up the water. Then the first one who got in after the water was stirred up recovered from whatever ailment he had.
5:13*r Lit slipped away, there being a crowd in that place
5:16*r Other mss add and trying to kill him
6:19*r Lit twenty-five or thirty stadia; one stadion = 600 feet
6:22*r Other mss add into which his disciples had entered
6:69*r Other mss read you are the Messiah, the Son of the Living God
7:32*r Or temple police, or officers, also in vv. 45,46
7:35*r Gk diaspora; Jewish people scattered throughout Gentile lands
7:39*r Lit the Spirit was not yet
7:46*r Other mss read like this man
7:53–8:11*r Other mss include all or some of the passage after Jn 7:36,44,52; 21:25; or Lk 21:38.
8:15*r Lit You judge according to the flesh
8:31*r Or my teaching, or my message, also in v. 37
8:33*r Or offspring; lit seed, also in v. 37; Jn 7:42
8:38*r Other mss read of my Father
8:57*r Other mss read and Abraham has seen you?
8:59*r Other mss add and having gone through their midst, he passed by
9:35*r Other mss read the Son of God
10:24*r Lit “How long are you taking away our life?
10:26*r Other mss add just as I told you
10:34*r Other mss read in the scripture
10:38*r Other mss read know and believe
11:18*r Lit fifteen stadia; one stadion = 600 feet
12:1*r Other mss read Lazarus who died
12:17*r Other mss read Meanwhile the crowd, which had been with him, continued to testify that he had called Lazarus out of the tomb and raised him from the dead.
12:48*r Lit has the one judging him
13:18*r Other mss read eats bread with me
13:23*r Lit reclining at Jesus’s breast; that is, on his right; Jn 1:18
13:32*r Other mss omit If God is glorified in him
14:4*r Other mss read this verse: And you know where I am going, and you know the way
14:7*r Other mss read If you had known me, you would have known
14:14*r Other mss omit all of v. 14
14:15*r Other mss read “If you love me, keep (as a command)
14:16*r Or advocate, or comforter, also in v. 26
14:30*r Lit He has nothing in me
16:4*r Other mss read when the time
16:16*r Other mss add because I am going to the Father
16:18*r Other mss omit he is saying
16:22*r Other mss read will have sorrow
16:27*r Other mss read from the Father
17:12*r The one destined for destruction, loss, or perdition
18:3*r Or temple police, or officers, also in vv. 12,18,22
18:40*r Or robber; see Jn 10:1,8 for the same Gk word used here
19:16*r Other mss add and led him out
19:39*r Lit a hundred litrai; a Roman litrai = 12 ounces
20:22*r Lit he breathed and said to them
20:31*r Or that the Messiah, the Son of God, is Jesus
21:1*r Another name for the Sea of Galilee
21:15–17*r Other mss read “Simon, son of Jonah; Mt 16:17; Jn 1:42
